Class com.chimu.form.FormRuntimeException 

java.lang.Object
   |
   +----java.lang.Throwable
           |
           +----java.lang.Exception
                   |
                   +----java.lang.RuntimeException
                           |
                           +----com.chimu.kernel.exceptions.RuntimeWrappedException
                                   |
                                   +----com.chimu.form.FormRuntimeException
public class FormRuntimeException
extends RuntimeWrappedException
implements FormThrowInfo
FormRuntimeException is a generic exception coming from the FORM subsystem. More specific exceptions are generated, see the "see also" section.

FormExceptions provide extra details on who recognized an error, during what stage the error was caused, and who caused it. These may make error recognition easier.

See Also:
ExecutionException, ConfigurationException, TransactionException

Variable Index

- anomaly
- causeString
- recognizerString
- stageString

toString in class RuntimeWrappedException
recognizer 
 public String recognizer()
Returns the subsystem in which the error was recognized (?caused).

stage 
 public String stage()
The 'stage' of an error is at what phase of execution the error was caused. Configuration errors occur during Setup of an Orm or DatabaseConnection although they may only be detected later.
